choose: Choose Shwe Yoe Yar Restaurant for Fresh and delicious foods, clean accommodation for your healthy.
livetext: Indulge in an authentic culinary journey at Shwe Yoe Yar, where the vibrant flavors of Myanmar come to life. Nestled in a cozy yet modern setting, our restaurant and bar offers a unique blend of traditional Burmese cuisine and contemporary dining experiences. Whether you're here for a casual meal, a celebratory feast, or a relaxing drink, Shwe Yoe Yar promises an unforgettable experience.
history: In 1998, my father, U Soepain, opened the Shwe Traditional Khao Siew Shop at No. 24 Wai Bagi Road, Turn 6. After my father passed away in 2005, my mother took over the management.
purpose: The purpose of the shop is to maintain a clean environment, ensure healthy practices, and provide a calm and comfortable atmosphere. We aim to offer a space where everyone, regardless of race or religion, can relax. Additionally, our prices are reasonable so that people from all walks of life can enjoy a meal.
aboutService: The shop offers a range of services, including weddings, unplugged and live music, catering, family KTV, staff parties, a bar, BBQ, fine dining, and casual dining. As a medium-category establishment, it caters to people from all walks of life.
mission: Our Mission is to connect customers with delicious food, foster closer socio-economic communities, and provide clean accommodation.
welcome: Welcome to Shwe Yoe Yar Restaurant & Bar!
unplugged-text: Our restaurant offers unplugged music to keep customers happy and satisfied.Experience stress-free relaxation with delicious food and beverages accompanied by live entertainment at our restaurant.
event-text: Our restaurant often organizes special events featuring famous artists for our customers.In addition, we often arrange food promotions for our customers.
joyful-text: Shwe Yoe Yar â€“ the perfect setting for any dining occasion! Whether you're planning a romantic dinner, a family celebration, birthday celebration or a business lunch, we offer the ideal ambiance and mouthwatering dishes to make your experience extraordinary. Book with us today for an unforgettable gathering!
catering-text: Shwe Yoe Yar Catering Service provides services for private events catering, corporate catering, donation catering and others catering. We offer delicious & healthy food for your event. Please enquire further by calling or Email.
